@One_Angry_Chef You want/need dinner now, not in 3 hours time. Or you need cheap food you can store, not something that will go bad in days.

@One_Angry_Chef A lot of delay discounting is the result of intergenerational poverty & deprivation - you need £10 now, not £20 in 2 weeks.

Two degrees. One disability. No job. Money in the negative. This is objectively more important than debating the "right" terms to say.
... really pisses me off is people who wanna die on the hill of PC terms instead of focusing on access, employment, disability and housing.
I *loathe* the latter word. I have a barely controllable urge to physically lash out at people who use it/assume I'm OK with it. But what...
Amazing that half the people in the disabled community think "person with a disability" is a slur requiring a TW; then throw around "crip" 😖
"Stop abusing me/stop being an asshole to me" isn't tone policing, people. It's okay to pull up people who are attacking you online.
